services.title: Fullstack Software Engineering
services.description: As an avid NBA fan, I developed a captivating Flask web application merging NBA basketball and PokÃ©mon in 3x 2-week sprints. I created personalized statistic scores for NBA players based on self-created P.O.K.E.D. metrics and in doing so developed mastery of Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, SQLAlchemy, Bootstrap, and Jinja.

services.title: Backend Development
services.description: I created and designed a PostgreSQL database for Gameplay and REST APIs built in Django and Python connection to communicate with our Flutter frontend. Working with a team of 4 developers we have built a hashed user login/registration, a component-based design structure, and a serverless/passwordless login to communicate with the front end.

aboutpara:
As a Software Engineer with a robust understanding of technologies like Python, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, I've demonstrated extensive expertise not only in coding but also in delivering unparalleled customer service. 

My experience with my capstone project, PokÃ©hoops, a captivating Flask web application project, sharpened my skills in Python, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, PostgreSQL, and more. My roles at Kizik and THG underscored my ability to lead teams, train new hires, work from home, and maintain superior KPIs.

Having worked in both technical and customer-facing roles, I pride myself on not only addressing technical challenges but also being able to listen and problem-solver to ensure an optimal and efficient resolution.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with Python, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.

education.universityPara: 12 Week Full-stack web development bootcamp with Python JavaScript HTML CSS and more, Hands-on experience with Flask and React, Proficient in data structures, algorithms, and relational databases.
